show_name: D.C.II S.S. ~Da Capo II Second Season~ (TV)
other_title: D.C.II S.S. ～ダ・カーポII セカンドシーズン～ (Japanese)
plot: The story continues where it left off at season 1, but now we start to get to know the people we already know a little more in detail.
opening_theme: "Sakura Amaneku Sekai (サクラアマネクセカイ)" by yozuca*
ending_theme: "Ameagari kimi no moto he (雨上がり君のもとへ)" by CooRie (ep 13)
"Bokutachi no Yukue (僕たちの行方)" by CooRie (eps 1-12)
